featured.text: Sincerely yours, Eleanor Lightly Spokeswoman and Company Hair Stylist ABC Activity Insurance: Insure against overdoing it 41.

definition.zh_def: 發言人，特別是女性，代表某個組織或團體發表意見或信息的人。
definition.en_def: A female representative who speaks on behalf of an organization or group.
definition.example: The spokeswoman announced the new policy changes during the press conference.
